content: hi I'm Bridget Palmer and I'll be bringing you fresh ideas with what to do with those last few ingredients in your fridge today it's apple pie with caramel I'm using the last of my granny smith apples but you'll also need Woolies gold caramel salted desert sauce plain flour select mix spice butter and vanilla ice cream click here for the full recipe and to add all the ingredients to your trolley when you shop online there's nothing quite like homemade apple pie and this one's great because there's lots of shortcuts that I'm gonna show you along the way to start we need to make a pastry in a food processor add two and a half cups of plain flour two tablespoons of caster sugar and 250 grams of cold diced butter and process until it looks like bread crumbs then add an egg and the water and mix until it just comes together to form a loose dough give it a really quick need just to bring it all together 1/2 spoon will be our top and 1/2 Skanda be our base flatten it slightly into a little disc wrap it up these going to the fridge for 20 minutes my pastries been resting for 20 minutes now and it's ready to roll out I've got two sheets of baking paper here give it a little bash paper on top and start rolling roll out from the center of the pastry to the edges constantly move your pastry we want a 30 centimeter circle lift away the top sheet of paper I've got my greased 23 centimeter pie dish here peel away the top layer push it in down to the base of the pie ten leave this pastry overhanging the edge because when we put the lid on we'll trim away the excess pastry this goes back into the fridge for about 15 minutes while we roll out the lid pop you dough down onto the baking sheet give it a little bash and rolling from the center of the pastry out to the edges always moving it so you get a lovely round surface I have a little stack what we got in here which I'm gonna use to cut out six stars from my pastry lid and then this goes back into the fridge for about 15 minutes for the apple pie filling I would normally stir the apples but as a little shortcut I'm gonna peel pour and finally size five granny smith apples add them to a bowl with half a cup of lemon juice to make this apple pie even easier by the ingredients online and have a moment delivered so close those apple slices in that beautiful lemon juice and then drain the excess juice away add a teaspoon of mixed spice quarter of a cup of sugar two tablespoons of plain flour and two tablespoons of this amazing salted caramel dessert sauce this stuff is incredible I'm thoroughly addicted to it toss it all together to coat the apples and that beautiful caramel and the spices this is done time to fill our apple pie the apple mixture goes straight in so for the pastry need remove the stars first as a pretty detail pop the cutouts next to the holes and then the lid on top trim the edges of the pastry so I'm gonna hold it up go in and then just slide my knife like so and then to seal those two pastries together just pinch with your finger and your thumb and crimp all around the edge I've got a lightly beaten egg yolky which I'm gonna brush over the apple pie this will crisp up the pastry and make it beautiful and golden brown and then last of all just a light sprinkling of caster sugar this goes into the oven for 35 to 45 minutes till golden brown this kitchen is going to smell amazing my apple pies been out of the oven cooling for ten minutes now so it's ready to serve with either vanilla ice cream or cream but either way this apple pie with caramel sauce is sure to impress now if you like that all ingredients can be purchased at your local Woolies and online by clicking here to subscribe to our YouTube channel click here to explore all our other take 2 recipes click here and for more sweet treat and dessert recipes click here

title: How to Make Caramel Apples
original_title: HOW TO MAKE CARAMEL APPLE COOKIES
content: hey everyone in this video I'm going to show you how to make these caramel apple cookies in a large bowl sift together 2 cups of flour a teaspoon of baking soda a teaspoon of baking powder a half a teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a quarter teaspoon of ground cloves in another large bowl we're going to cream together 1/2 a cup of shortening and one cup of sugar add a cup of applesauce and 1 egg and then blend until well combined now we are going to add our dry ingredients and mix well now you're going to take spoonfuls and put them onto a greased cookie sheet I use tin foil and I also use one of these little cookie scoops I just find them to be really convenient pre-heat your oven to 375 and bake your cookies for about eight to ten minutes now we're going to make our caramel sauce for our cookies in a microwave-safe bowl i unwrapped about fourteen caramels and I'm going to add a tablespoon and a half of heavy whipping cream I'm going to heat that in the microwave mixing as I go until smooth now here we have our cookie decorating station I'm going to take a cookie that has cooled I'm going to spoon on some my hot caramel and then right away I'm going to sprinkle on some crunched-up peanuts and there we have our caramel apple cookie one of my favorite things about fall is the caramel apples and now I get to enjoy them in a cookie thanks so much for watching bye mmm [Music] you
